name: TekSynapNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The TekSynap News flash briefing is meant to allow our employees to more easily connect with what is happening at TekSynap. Just add to your Echo Dots skills through the Alexa App and ask, "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
